amendment.description: Amendment sought to express the sense of Congress empowering States with authority for most of the taxing and spending for highway and mass transit programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 29 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to empower States with authority for most taxing and spending for highway programs and mass transit programs, and for other purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A069) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 310 (Roll no. 606).

action.text: Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. DeSantis to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSantis amendment (A069) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 310 (Roll no. 606).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A069) offered by Mr. DeSantis to the Rules amendment (A001).
